subject: 1 Receipt
body:
1 Receipt



Hello Kay Atkins,

Special Note


I remembered I hadn't sent this receipt. So, here you go! This was for the lesson on April 18th.

Thank you for your business. Attached to this email should be 1 Receipt for a total of: $29.00.

Details


Payment ID: 35 for $29.00 on April 23, 2024 for the job Corban Atkins



As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $0.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Music Instruction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.
